body.title: Format
body.elms:
| Switch | Description |
|---|---|
| `-1` | One entry per line |
| `-l` | Long view |
| `-o` | Long view (without groups) |
| `-C` | Multicolumn (sorted horizontally) |
| `-x` | Multicolumn (sorted vertically) |
|---
| `-F` | Add / after directories |
| `-G` | Color |
{:.shortcuts}

body.title: Options
body.elms:
| `-R` | Recurse |
| `-a` | Include hidden (dotfiles) |
| `-A` | Include hidden (but not . and ..) |
{:.shortcuts}

body.title: Sorting
body.elms: | Switch | Description | |---|---| | `-r` | reverse order | | `-S` | sort by size | | `-t` | sort by time modified | | `-u` | sort by time accessed | | `-U` | sort by time created | | `-c` | sort by time status was changed | |--- | `-h` | Human-readable size (3k) | {:.shortcuts}

body.title: Modes
body.elms:
| `-f` | follow |
| `-F` | follow by filename (accounts for log rotation) |
| `-r` | Reverse order |
{:.shortcuts}

body.title: Options
body.elms: | `-bN` | N*512 bytes | | `-cN` | N bytes | | `-nN` | N lines | | `+N` | Start from line N | {:.shortcuts}

body.title: Options
body.elms:
| `-A` | Use $SUDO_ASKPASS |
| `-b` | Run in background |
| `-E` | Preserve environment |
| `-H` | use target's $HOME |
| `-n` | Don't prompt for password |
| `-P` | Preserve group vector |
| `-S` | Read password from stdin |
{:.shortcuts}

body.title: File descriptors
body.elms:
| `-C fd` | Close all open file descriptors |
{:.shortcuts}

body.title: Interactive
body.elms:
| Switch | Description |
|---|---|
| `-i [cmd]` | Interactive shell without variables |
| `-s [cmd]` | Interactive shell |
|----
| `-u user` | run as this user |
| `-g group` | run as this group |
{:.shortcuts}

body.title: Timestamp
body.elms: | `-v` | revalidate timestamp for 5 mins | | `-k` | invalidate timestamp | | `-K` | just like -k | {:.shortcuts}
``` ... | wc [options] ``` | `-c` | Bytes | | `-l` | Lines | | `-m` | Characters (incl multi-byte) | | `-w` | Words | {:.shortcuts}

body.title: Options
body.elms:
| Switch | Description |
|---|---|
| `-A num` | Print `num` lines of training context |
|----
| `-G` | --basic-regexp (default) |
| `-E` | --extended-regexp |
| `-P` | --perl-regexp |
|----
| `-f file` | --file (Get patterns for file) |
| `-F` | --fixed-strings |
|----
| `-h` | --no-filename |
| `-H` | --with-filename |
|----
| `-l` | --files-with-matches (just print filenames) |
| `-L` | --files-without-match |
|----
| `-r, -R` | --recursive |
| `-v` | --invert-match |
| `-i` | --ignore-case |
{:.shortcuts}
